description:
When Class 2-F has to pick a project for the school’s annual festival, the gang decides to run a restaurant! If they can make some money, they might get to upgrade their gear. Unfortunately, deadly dumplings and a kidnapping could cut into their profits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 1日目「僕とメイドと新たなる旅立ち」
Day 1: Me, Maids, and a New Start
Dia 1 - Eu, As Maids E O Início De Uma Nova Jornada!
Ichinichi-me: Boku to Maid to Aratanaru Tabidachi
